trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer"></xref> encounters an invalid data contract during serialization and deserialization.

An instance of this type will be thrown if the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> or <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> detects that the type of the instance being serialized or deserialized is invalid.
An instance of this type will also be thrown if an invalid type is passed to the schema import or export engine.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.InvalidDataContractException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.InvalidDataContractException"></xref> class with the specified error message.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.InvalidDataContractException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref>.
This constructor is used in deserialization by one of the formatters in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization> namespace.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains data needed to serialize and deserialize an object.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that specifies user context during serialization and deserialization.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.InvalidDataContractException"></xref> class with the specified error message and inner exception.
